      • initializePredators

        void initializePredators(int number,
                         int speed,
                         float health,
                         float attack,
                         float groupRadius,
                         float visionRadius,
                         float stayInGroupTendency,
                         Predator.HuntingMethod huntingMethod,
                         javafx.scene.paint.Color predatorColor,
                         javafx.scene.paint.Color groupColor)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Randomly create predators in the map
        Parameters:
        number: - number of predators to create
        speed: - predators' speed (tiles/iteration)
        health: - predators' health
        attack: - predators' attack
        groupRadius: - predators' group radius
        visionRadius: - predators' vision radius
        predatorColor: - predators' color for visualization
        groupColor: - groups' color for visualization
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • initializePreys

        void initializePreys(int number,
                     int speed,
                     float nutrition,
                     float attack,
                     int minSize,
                     int maxSize,
                     float visionRadius,
                     float newPreyPerIteration,
                     javafx.scene.paint.Color primaryColor)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Randomly create preys in the map
        Parameters:
        number: - number of preys to create
        speed: - preys' speed (tileSize/iteration)
        nutrition: - preys' nutrition
        attack: - preys' attack
        minSize: - preys' min size, cannot be less than 1
        maxSize: - preys' max size, cannot be less than 1
        visionRadius: - preys' vision radius
        primaryColor: - preys' primary color for visualization
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
